name: findMarkers
description: Operator to identify marker genes in scRNA-seq clusters.

properties.name: direction
properties.description: The direction of log-fold changes to be considered for each cluster.

properties.name: log_fold_change_threshold
properties.description: Log-fold change threshold to be tested against.

properties.name: comparison_to_make
properties.description: Whether the function should compare each cluster to any other cluster or to all clusters.
